title: TIP3 - LON mining settlement cycle adjustment (LON 挖矿结算周期调整)
body:
Background
* The current second phase LON mining settlement cycle is once a day, and the settlement time is 0:00 UTC every day. 
* Market makers are included in this phase and 200,000 LON tokens are allocated daily. Some community members reported that the settlement cycle is too short, which resulted in a significant impact on power-to-LON ratio by the total volume of the day.

Goal
* Let community members vote to decide the mining settlement cycle again.

Proposed Action Items
* Make changes based on the voting results of the proposal (if necessary), and take effect at 0:00 UTC on November 7, 2020.

Voting Options
* A. No change, keep the settlement cycle once a day. The settlement time is * 0:00 UTC every day.
* B. Make a change, modify the settlement cycle to once a week. The settlement time is 0:00 UTC every Saturday.
* C. Make a change, modify the settlement cycle to once only. The settlement time is 0:00 UTC on December 20, 2020, the end of the second phase.

---

背景
* 目前第二阶段 LON 挖矿结算周期为每日一次，结算时间为每日 0:00 UTC 时间。
* 第二阶段引入了做市商激励，LON 日分发量调整为20万，部分社区成员反馈结算周期较短，导致当日总交易量对算力与 LON 的转化比值影响较大。

目的
* 让社区成员再次投票决策挖矿结算周期。

提案执行项
* 根据提案投票结果作出修改（如需），生效时间为 2020 年 11 月 7 日 0:00 UTC

投票选项
* A. 不修改，保持结算周期每天一次，结算时间为每天 0:00 UTC
* B. 修改，结算周期修改为每周一次，结算时间为每周六 0:00 UTC
* C. 修改，结算周期修改为仅有一次，结算时间为 2020 年 12 月 20 日 0:00 UTC，即第二阶段挖矿结束时
choices: B. Change to weekly (修改至周结算)
C. Change to once only (修改至二阶段结束时结算)
